name: Brave Square
description:
Hello,

This is my third game jam

If you find any bugs while playing my game please tell me in the comments

If you want to give any suggestions tell me in the comments

I didn't had much time to make more level or make level_3 (last level) good

I used the Courage theme in my story

Story:-

A Square want to enter the square planet but he is not brave enough to do it himself.

Help him in his journey.

Controls:-

WSAD To Move

W,Space to jump

Press Enter For Next Dialogue

Thanks for playing my game
